question: Which among the following Committee on Panchayati Raj came to the conclusion that the developmental process was gradually bureaucratised and divorced from the Panchayati Raj?
explanation: G V K Rao Committee was constituted in the year 1985 and came to the conclusion that the process of development was gradually bureaucratised and divorced from the Panchayati Raj which was against the democratisation weakened the Panchayati Raj institutions resulting in what is aptly called as ‘grass without roots’.
